DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate immunogenicity , safety tolerability fully liquid pentavalent vaccine ( DTwP-Hib-HepB Vaccine ) infants 6-8 week age .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity , Safety Tolerability Fully Liquid Pentavalent ( DTwP-Hib-Hep B ) Vaccine Infants 6-8 Weeks Age
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject ≥ 42 day ≤ 64 day age . 2 . Written inform consent obtain either parents/ legal guardian nature study explain accord local regulatory requirement 1 . Subjects whose parent legal guardian unwilling unable give write informed consent participate study . 2 . History previous immunization vaccine contain 5 antigen component investigational vaccine . 3 . History anaphylactic shock ( immediate hypersensitivity reaction ) , urticaria allergic reaction previous vaccination know hypersensitivity vaccine component . 4 . Administration parenteral immunoglobulin preparation and/or blood product since birth .
